record.field: iPhone 16 Pro Max features a 6.9" Super Retina XDR display, A18 Pro chip, advanced triple-camera system, and a titanium frame.
iPhone 16 Plus with a 6.7" display, A18 chip, and improved battery life. Color: Black Titanium.
iPhone 15 Plus comes with a 6.7" display, A17 chip, and dual-camera system. Color: Black.
iPhone 16e is a budget-friendly model with a 6.1" display, A16 chip, and long battery life. Color: Black Titanium.

Apple USB-C to MagSafe 3 Cable for fast and efficient charging, compatible with MacBook models using MagSafe 3.

The Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra 5G features a massive 14.6" Super AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, 5G connectivity, dual front cameras for video calls, S Pen support, and a sleek, ultra-thin design ideal for multitasking.
Large 12.4" display, Exynos 1380 chipset, IP68 water resistance, and S Pen support make it perfect for creative professionals and students alike.
Compact and powerful tablet with a 10.9" LCD display, IP68 resistance, and S Pen support, ideal for everyday tasks.
Premium 14.6" AMOLED tablet with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 5G, quad speakers, and S Pen—perfect for professionals and media consumption.
Expected with upgraded display, faster chip, and improved battery life. Aimed at users seeking flagship features at a budget-friendly price.
Flagship model with cutting-edge specs, enhanced S Pen features, and AMOLED display. Perfect for power users and creatives.
10.9" Liquid Retina display, A14 Bionic chip, USB-C, and Apple Pencil support. Balanced between performance and value.
Featuring Apple M1 chip, 10.9" display, and sleek design. Ideal for creative professionals and multitaskers.
Compact 8.3" display, A15 Bionic chip, Apple Pencil (2nd Gen) support, and USB-C—perfect for on-the-go productivity.
Powered by M2 chip, 11" Liquid Retina display, Face ID, 5G, and Apple Pencil hover. Ultimate performance in a slim design.
Apple AirPods Max feature high-fidelity audio, active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and a premium over-ear design with memory foam ear cushions.
Premium wireless headphones with signature Bang And Olufsen sound, active noise cancellation, and long battery life in a lightweight frame.
Refined design with adaptive noise canceling, immersive audio experience, and luxurious materials for comfort and clarity.
On-ear wireless headphones with personalized spatial audio, up to 50 hours battery, and a bold Cloud Pink colorway.
Advanced over-ear wireless headphones with spatial audio, ANC, USB-C audio support, and up to 40 hours of battery life.
Iconic Bose sound with next-gen active noise canceling, all-day comfort, and multi-point Bluetooth connectivity.
Apple AirPods 4 with improved battery life, spatial audio, and seamless integration with Apple devices.
Apple AirPods 4 with active noise cancellation, adaptive EQ, and high-fidelity audio.
Apple AirPods Pro 2 with enhanced ANC, adaptive transparency, and MagSafe charging case.

Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, 4K 60p video, fast autofocus, and professional RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM lens.

Lightweight full-frame mirrorless with 24.2MP sensor, advanced autofocus, and RF 24-50mm kit lens ideal for beginners.
Canon EOS R5 Mark II + RF 24-105mm f/4L IS USM
Flagship mirrorless with 45MP resolution, 8K video, IBIS, and professional zoom lens. Designed for advanced creators.
High-resolution mirrorless camera with L-Mount support, Phase Detection AF, and 60MP sensor for studio and landscape professionals.
Special Disney edition of the Leica Q2 with a 47MP full-frame sensor and Summilux 28mm lens, perfect for collectors and enthusiasts.
Compact full-frame camera with fixed Summilux 28mm f/1.7 lens, 60MP sensor, and advanced connectivity for premium photography.
Rangefinder camera with a 60MP BSI CMOS sensor, iconic manual design, and exceptional image quality. A classic redefined.
Flagship mirrorless camera with 45.7MP stacked sensor, 20fps RAW, 8K 60p video, and built-in vertical grip. Designed for professionals in sports and wildlife.
Compact Z9-level power with the same 45.7MP sensor, dual CFexpress cards, and 8K video. Includes 24-70mm f/2.8 lens.
Cinema-ready camera with full-frame 12MP sensor, S-Cinetone color, 4K 120p recording, and compact body for handheld and drone use.
Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 400mm f/2.8E FL ED VR Lens

Professional-grade super-telephoto lens featuring a fast f/2.8 aperture, lightweight fluorite elements, ED glass for minimal chromatic aberration, and Vibration Reduction (VR) for stable handheld shooting. Ideal for sports and wildlife photography.
Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 180-400mm f/4E TC1.4 FL ED VR
Advanced zoom telephoto lens with built-in 1.4x teleconverter, constant f/4 aperture, and Vibration Reduction. Ideal for sports and wildlife professionals.
A compact and fast telephoto zoom for the RF mount with 5-stop Image Stabilizer and weather-sealed construction.
High-performance super-telephoto lens for professional sports and wildlife photography with fast autofocus and 5.5-stop IS.
Canon RF 600mm f/4 L IS USM Lens
Super-telephoto lens with a bright f/4 aperture, advanced image stabilization, and dual nano USM for fast and quiet autofocus. Ideal for sports and wildlife photography.
Canon RF 800mm f/5.6 L IS USM Lens
Lightweight and compact 800mm super-telephoto lens with f/5.6 aperture and built-in IS. Offers incredible reach and optical quality for professional wildlife and sports shooters.
Canon RF 1200mm f/8 L IS USM Lens
The longest native RF lens for Canon mirrorless, offering 1200mm of reach in a portable design. Features image stabilization, weather resistance, and L-series optical quality.
Sony FE 400-800mm f/6.3-6.3 G OSS Lens
Lightweight and versatile 400-800mm zoom lens with excellent sharpness, Optical SteadyShot, and fast autofocus. Ideal for sports and wildlife photography.
Leica APO-Summicron-M 50mm f/2.0 ASPH. Black Anodized Lens
High-performance 50mm lens with fast f/2.0 aperture, exceptional sharpness, and a unique color signature. Ideal for street and portrait photography.
Legendary fast lens with an f/1.25 aperture, ideal for low-light and creative portraiture with a shallow depth of field. The best in optical quality from Leica.
The iconic Noctilux-M lens with a silver finish, providing exceptional optical performance and creamy bokeh for professionals and enthusiasts.
Compact and high-quality wide-angle lens with fast f/1.4 aperture. Perfect for landscapes and street photography with incredible image clarity and minimal distortion.
Exceptional fast lens with f/1.0, ideal for professional portrait and low-light photography, with iconic Leica sharpness and bokeh.
Leica M10 Black Summilux-M 1:1.5 90mm ASPH. Left
High-quality Leica lens with fast f/1.5 aperture, ideal for portrait photography and delivering exceptional sharpness and bokeh. Black anodized finish.
Nikon NIKKOR Z 600mm f/4 TC VR S Lens
A high-performance telephoto lens with fast f/4 aperture and excellent optical stabilization. Ideal for wildlife and sports photography.
Nikon NIKKOR Z 400mm f/2.8 TC VR S Lens
A super-telephoto lens with fast f/2.8 aperture and advanced Vibration Reduction. Perfect for professional wildlife, sports, and bird photography.
Iconic Leica lens with fast f/1.2 aperture, known for its exceptional bokeh and sharpness. Perfect for low-light, portrait, and artistic photography.
High-quality versatile zoom lens with fast f/2.8 aperture, excellent sharpness, and fast autofocus for professional videography and photography.
